Name: Tora
About the game: Tora is a table top, local multiplayer experience in which you' and your friends will have to save the country Tora from the evil robots that have taken over. You will fight monsters, to level up and finallly take on the factory at the end of each of the 4 levels. At the end the player with most fans will be victorious.
